astec.title: Astec Interactive
astec.projectDescription: 3d interactive touch-screen experience built with Unreal Engine 4

content.article: The Astec Interactive touch-screen experience presents virtual construction machinery for potential corporate buyers. Astec Interactive’s content is served from the local JSON object data via the Blueprint Visual Scripting Language. Astec Interactive is compiled with Unreal 4's 3D game engine. Users are invited to interact with the 3d models of Astec’s construction machinery on a large touch-screen display. The Astec Interactive experience is also playable on a standard desktop PC.

images.caption: Astec’s construction models are displayed alongside the sidebar.
Astec Forms
images.alt: Forms allow easy sign-up of new instersted corporate buyers.

images.caption: Astec Interactive’s main product page is built to accommodate a variety of content types.
Astec Interactive’s main product page features Astec’s construction equipment as a bisected 3D model.
Astec Interactive’s initial view presents users with a planet for construction equipment. This view serves as both a screen-saver and a starting screen.
Astec Interactive’s 3d models can be rotated by user’s touch input.
Astec’s sales representatives are broken down by region or state, allowing users to choose which representative to contact.
Users can view Astec’s construction models through categorized views.
A specific plant component’s information is available to users on click.
Astec Interactive’s users can select common preset plant configurations featuring models of Astec’s construction equipment.

servpro-halloween.title: Servpro Halloween
servpro-halloween.projectDescription: Reactive time-based Halloween themed game built with VueJS and HTML5 audio

content.article: Servpro Halloween is built with VueJS and reactive SVG objects. Servpro Halloween’s data-state, logic, and routing are controlled via JavaScript and JSON object data. Servpro Halloween features the HTML5 audio API. Scaling down gracefully, Servpro Halloween works flawlessly on both mobile and desktop.

images.caption: SVG objects are layered into the background and made selectable to minimize external object calls.
Beware! If you take too long you may be presented with a scare!
Game instructions are presented prior to game play.
Information is presented to users via Servpro Halloween's landing page.
Servpro Halloween's landing page is responsive and works flawlessly on both mobile and desktop.
Even the Zombie is responsive!
Servpro Halloween is based on a 16:9 ratio. The user's device must be rotated to continue game-play. Users are progressively warned.
Users are presented various dialogue screens injected directly into the viewport.
Servpro Halloween's game-play was built to be as flexible as possible while maintaining a specfic 16:9 ratio.
All things, even scary, must come to an end... but they can be responsive too!
Another responsive view of Servpro Halloween's completed game state.

servpro-prep.title: Servpro Prep
servpro-prep.projectDescription: A survival themed SPA (Single Page Application) built with VueJS.

mainImage.caption: Do you know which items you'll need in an emergency?

content.article: Servpro Prep’s interactive experience leverages VueJS and localStorage to limit user game-play. Repeat visitors’ game-play is set to completed and displays Servpro’s call-to-action.

images.caption: Reactive SVGs are responsively positioned and placed on the user's viewport.
Servpro Prep's game logic and state allows collected items to be stored in local data.
Items of all different shapes and sizes can be placed in the game.
Upon landing users are presented with a default VueJS "Home" component.
Servpro Prep works flawlessly on both mobile and desktop devices.
Servpro Prep's responsive forms use the POST method to send data from the game's call-to-action.
User's score is tallied and the user is offered to play again.
Servpro Prep is made playable through flexible SCSS and works flawlessly on both mobile and desktop devices.
Users are presented with a set of instructions before beginning Servpro Prep's game-play.
Servpro Prep's dialogue box is responsive as possible.
Servpro Prep is locked to a horizontal aspect ratio. User's mobile device rotation is detected via JavaScript.
Servpro Prep's desktop landing page is presented in a user's viewport.

servpro-holiday.title: Servpro Holiday
servpro-holiday.projectDescription: Holiday themed responsisve informational SPA (Single Page Application) built with VueJS.

mainImage.caption: Do you know what dangers are present inside and out?

content.article: Servpro Holiday is an informational marketing SPA (Single Page Application) built with VueJS. Servpro Holiday tracks analytical data through user interaction. Each holiday-related danger is presented to users in an ultra-flexible information box. The user is encouraged to click-through each danger.

images.caption: Servpro Holiday's call-to-action is built to be responsive and flexible.
Servpro Holiday's information boxes are placed via SCSS around the user's viewport and locked to a ratio.
Servpro Holiday's users are presented information boxes through JavaScript transitions and animations.
Servpro Holiday's snow is dynamically generated from JavaScript based on animationFrame.
Servpro Holiday is responsive and works flawlessly on mobile and desktop devices.
Servpro Holiday's mobile view of the landing page.
Each Servpro Holiday informaion box is the same component. Different parameters are passed allowing the information box different display configurations.
Servpro Holiday's responsive layout is locked to a screen ratio of 16:9.
Servpro Holiday's information box works with the dynamically generated JavaScript snow.
